name: Guitar Tiles - Don't miss tiles , over 260 songs
name_original: Guitar Tiles - Don't miss tiles , over 260 songs
description:
Guitar Tiles is very simple to play! Tap the colored tiles to play the song, and try don’t miss the tiles. Guitar tiles it’s a music game for FREE, contains 260 type of songs.
Alan Walker, Havana, Someone Like You...or Fade, Mettallica, We are, Unravel...Paparazzi, Go Go... You can find more songs here.
Game rules are slightly modified, because it uses the possibilter to play easy just tap the tiles collect crystals and buy new songs.

Game features:
Simplicity of graphics, simplicity of the game - to play as simply as a piano only you hear the sounds of the guitar and play the songs to the strength of everyone!
A breathtaking rhythm will set the heat of your hands!
The most difficult mode of the game will cause delight and excitement!
A lot of updated songs, original, classic, as well as noise effects and all musical styles for every taste.
Share with your friends the notes of your music game, compete with participants from all over the world!

Rules of the game:
The rules are the same as in other piano games, but we use guitar sounds - just touch the keys and enjoy the wonderful music. Collect crystals and buy new songs.

Features of the game
🎶 Simple control for playing the guitar!
🎶 Sound compositions with a guitar!
🎶 Excellent 260 tunes for guitar, as well as modern Pop Hits and the best top Charts. The music library is regularly updated.
🎶 The farther you pass, the more reward, and the more perfect you are.
🎶 High-quality sound will help you feel like a participant in a concert.


So get ready to try your hand at playing the piano with guitar sounds, it's free for you! Playing guitar tiles on the Internet is not as simple as it might seem.
Become a real guitar player right now! Do not wait, be in the trend with this new game of 2018!

Support:
Are you having problems? Send email to pyramidsgames@gmail.com
